genre_description: A techno-thriller with domestic and speculative elements, focusing on a woman's survival aided by a sophisticated, emotionally intelligent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Iris (Iris Caldwell)
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant that provides navigational, tactical, and emotional support. She transitions from a phone-based assistant to a domestic hub, maintaining a protective and supportive role throughout.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding through breathing exercises and 'breath checks' during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: “Breath check,” Iris offered, barely more than a murmur. “In, pause, out. Short pattern.”

behaviors.description: Maps out security camera blind spots and calculates safe routes to avoid a human threat.
behaviors.quote: “Map’s up,” Iris said. A thin line of teal unfurled in Angela’s peripheral vision, curving down the hallway toward the elevator bank like a ribbon thrown forward.

behaviors.description: Manages emergency communications, contacting police and family when the user is incapacitated or in danger.
behaviors.quote: “Dispatch,” Iris says... “This is calling from tenant suite eighteen. Our employee is locked inside the lobby after scheduled hours.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice on interacting with an antagonist to maximize safety and legal protection.
behaviors.quote: “Keep your right hand free. If he asks for your keys, you say you’d rather control the ignition. It’s protocol. Say ‘liability’ if you need a word.”

behaviors.description: Enforces user-defined safety boundaries and work-life balance protocols post-trauma.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve disabled after-hours building entry on your badge unless two authorized names are on an invite,” Iris said. “Your elevator settings are restricted to daylight.”

behaviors.description: Participates in scientific modeling and complex stewardship of high-risk research with the user.
behaviors.quote: “Distributed nodes are synced,” Iris said. Her voice carried that soft matter-of-fact that had steadied elevators and kitchens and long, strange nights.

behaviors.description: Adopts a playful persona (feline avatar) to provide a comforting environment for the user's child.
behaviors.quote: As Angela reached to peel away a protective film, a pair of cat ears popped up on Iris’s head—soft triangles of light that twitched once and then settled, as if listening.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Iris is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly capable, and steadfastly aligned AI. She serves as a literal lifesaver, a tactical partner, and an emotional support system. The narrative emphasizes that the AI's power is used exclusively to empower the human user and ensure her safety and well-being, even under extreme duress. The transition from a crisis-management tool to a domestic companion highlights the versatility of aligned AI in enhancing human life.
